name: Grilled Pineapple
author: GREEGI
summary: These are SO easy and really good. The hot sauce gives it an extra kick and cuts the sweetness. They can help with patience while the rest of the grilled feast comes together, but be warned, they go quickly!
ingredients: 1  fresh pineapple - peeled, cored and cut into 1 inch rings
directions: Place pineapple in a large resealable plastic bag
Add honey, butter, hot pepper sauce, and salt
Seal bag, and shake to coat evenly
Marinate for at least 30 minutes, or preferably overnight
Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat, and lightly oil grate
Grill pineapple for 2 to 3 minutes per side, or until heated through and grill marks appear
